page.title: 14A day in the life of Robert
page.content: I wake up at 7, o' clock get dressed and have breakfast of toast and cereal. After washing and brushing my teeth I wait for te taxi to arrive to take me to school. It arrives at 8.35.While I wait for the taxi I feed the horses at the top farm. In school we have engilsh, maths, reading and sport, we have three breaks. we leave school at 3.30. At home I have a snack then changed into old clothes, then I take the dog for a walk and feed the calfs then muck out.I watch t.v. for a bit. I get ready for bed about 7.30. I sleep on the top bunk and my sister sleeps on the bottom. A bunk, bed are two beds on top of each other, I live in a caravan. A caravan is a big room that people can live in.
